title: Questions asked by a travel agent
context: Ask a client where they want to fly and what days they want to travel.

content.bestLine: Where would you like to fly and on which days?

neutral.text: What cities are you traveling between?
Can you tell me your travel dates?
When were you thinking of traveling?
Where do you want to go and when?

formal.text: Could you please provide your travel itinerary?
What are your travel plans, sir/ma'am?
I'd be happy to assist you with your flight arrangements.
To better assist you, may I have your travel dates?
How may I assist you with your travel plans today?

patterns.template: I'm looking for flights from [options] to [options]
patterns.meaning: Client is searching for flights between two cities
Client is specifying their preferred travel days

dialogs.description: Travel agent inquiring about client's travel plans

lines.speaker: Travel Agent
lines.text: Hello, how can I assist you with your travel plans today?

lines.speaker: Client
lines.text: Hi, I'm looking for flights from New York to Los Angeles next Friday.

dialogs.description: Client providing travel information to the travel agent

lines.speaker: Travel Agent
lines.text: What's your destination and when would you like to travel?

lines.speaker: Client
lines.text: I'd like to go to Chicago and return on Monday.
